mapper.select: SELECT t1.FSTOCKID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FGROUP, t4.FNAME AS groupName, t1.FMODIFYDATE FROM T_BD_STOCK t1, T_BD_STOCK_L t2, T_BD_STOCKGROUP t3, T_BD_STOCKGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FSTOCKID = t2.FSTOCKID AND t1.FGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID and t2.FNAME like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
